msg: SOLR-7837: An AuthenticationPlugin which implements the HTTP BasicAuth protocol and stores credentials securely in ZooKeeper

author: noble
msg: SOLR-7757: Improved security framework where security components can be edited/reloaded, Solr now watches /security.json. Components can choose to make their configs editable
